titles.title: To authorize and direct the Committee on Appropriations to create a new Subcommittee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules and Organization of the House.

committee.subcommittee: Rules and Organization of the House
committee.name: House Rules

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Directs the Committee on Appropriations to establish a new Subcommittee on Veterans' Affairs with exclusive subcommittee jurisdiction over the Department of Veterans Affairs and its programs.
